text: Comprehensive Quality Engineering and Testing Services designed to help product and engineering teams build reliable, high-performing, and user-centric applications.

Flexible Engagement Models

Our engagement models range from full QA ownership to staff augmentation, enabling clients to scale quality operations with speed, efficiency, and measurable outcomes.

Full Ownership

End-to-end QA governance with complete accountability

Co-Ownership

Shared responsibility between Moolya and client QA teams

Staff Augmentation

Skilled QA professionals integrate seamlessly into your ongoing projects

QA Ownership Model

When quality assurance needs to deliver tangible outcomes, Moolya takes full ownership of the QA process. We define, execute, and continuously improve test strategies to ensure product reliability, user satisfaction, and faster go-to-market.

Functional Testing

End-to-end test ownership across functional, regression, exploratory, and usability areas

Automation Testing

Scalable automation frameworks with CI/CD integration for faster feedback

Performance Testing

Load, stress, and scalability validation for server and client-side performance

Security Testing

Comprehensive VAPT aligned to OWASP Top 10 and compliance frameworks

Functional Testing Ownership

Challenges We Address

• Testing handled by developers with limited QA focus
• QA bandwidth consumed by release testing, leaving regression untested
• High production defect rate despite internal QA
• Pre-launch app readiness validation required
• Crowd-sourced testing for real-world conditions
• Inefficient QA processes lacking structure
• Need for usability and UX validation

Moolya's Approach

Risk-Based Testing

Context-driven and Growth-driven testing aligned to product goals

Dedicated QA Pods

Agile alignment with client delivery teams

Proactive Quality Monitoring

Continuous visibility into defects, trends, metrics, and release readiness

Performance Testing

• Web & Mobile Application Vulnerabilities

• Cloud & Configuration Security

Case Study 1

Leading Life Sciences Data Management Platform

About the Platform

A cloud-based life sciences data management platform built for global pharmaceutical enterprises to streamline multi-country clinical operations. The platform centralizes data collection, regulatory tracking, and analytics across study sites.

Test Value Delivered

• End-to-End Test Automation: Developed 420+ automated test scripts across API, UI, and backend layers, increasing regression coverage by 65% and reducing manual effort by 45% per release.
• Compliance-Driven Validation: Designed 180+ test scenarios aligned with 21 CFR Part 11, HIPAA, and GxP frameworks, ensuring audit readiness and traceability.
• Performance and Data Accuracy Testing: Simulated concurrent user loads up to 10,000 sessions to validate system stability under production-scale volumes.

Business Impact

• Faster Release Turnaround: Achieved 40% reduction in release validation time, enabling biweekly release cycles instead of monthly.
• Improved Data Confidence: Ensured 99.8% data accuracy in system-to-system synchronization during validation cycles.
• Simplified Compliance Audits: Reduced audit preparation time from 3 weeks to 5 business days, supported by automated validation documentation.
heading_level_2: Leading Life Sciences Data Management Platform
section: Case Study 1 > Leading Life Sciences Data Management Platform

text:
Case Study 2

Clinical Trial Automation and Monitoring Platform

About the Platform

A digital clinical trial management platform built to help CROs and pharma sponsors manage multi-phase studies, real-time site monitoring, and patient safety reporting across multiple geographies.

Test Value Delivered

• Automated Regression and Validation: Implemented automation covering 14 core modules and 75 business-critical workflows, achieving 70% automation coverage in under 8 weeks.
• Integration Testing Across Ecosystem: Verified seamless interoperability among EDC, CTMS, and Safety systems using mock and live API environments 4 ensuring 100% data consistency across integrations.
• Risk-Based Testing Approach: Adopted a hybrid validation model prioritizing high-risk modules, optimizing QA effort by 35% without reducing test depth.

Business Impact

• Accelerated UAT Sign-offs: Reduced UAT cycle time from 12 days to 7 days, improving overall release cadence.
• Zero Critical Defects in Production: Achieved a defect leakage rate below 0.3% post-release.
• Enhanced Sponsor Confidence: Helped the client secure three additional clinical partnerships through improved platform reliability and audit readiness.
heading_level_2: Clinical Trial Automation and Monitoring Platform
section: Case Study 2 > Clinical Trial Automation and Monitoring Platform
